suffix2.MEANING: the appearance/manner of actions or verbs

suffix2.MEANING: the complete situations of the actions
particle: used to denote the beginning of an action
particle: used to denote an action away from the speaker or to denote the direction of the action
utmost, put to best use, exhaust
fall,drop,go down,decline,set (of sun),ebb (of tide),remain where one is,stay behind,turn over to,belong to,rest with,obtain,receive
touch,come into contact with,feel,be affected by (cold/etc.),catch fire
